Address.value: 50 MILLSTONE ROAD,BUILDING 400, SUITE 130, EAST WINDSOR, New Jersey, 08512, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Greenland Technologies Holding Corp is a developer of innovative and quality solutions in the material handling industry. It is a transmission and drivetrain systems provider for material handling equipment such as forklift trucks for industrial and logistic applications. The company sold more than 108000 sets of transmission systems to over 100 forklift manufacturers in China. With the emphasis on quality and innovation, over the years, Greenland gained the trust and loyalty from its customers.
